trans-unit.source: Represents a connection to a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 表示對 SQL Server 資料庫的連線。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> object represents a unique session to a SQL Server data source.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>物件表示 SQL Server 資料來源的唯一工作階段。

trans-unit.source: With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server.
trans-unit.target: 具有用戶端/伺服器資料庫系統，它相當於伺服器的網路連線。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is used together with <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> to increase performance when connecting to a Microsoft SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 會搭配<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>來連接到 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫時，提升效能。

trans-unit.source: For all third-party SQL Server products and other OLE DB-supported data sources, use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 所有協力廠商的 SQL Server 產品和其他的 OLE DB 支援的資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>, all properties are set to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的執行個體<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>，所有屬性都設為其初始值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需這些值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> for a list of the keywords in a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>中的連接字串關鍵字的清單。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> goes out of scope, it won't be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>移出的範圍，它將不會關閉。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須明確地關閉此連接呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`。

trans-unit.source: `Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent.
trans-unit.target: `Close` 和`Dispose`相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接共用值`Pooling`設`true`或`yes`、 基礎連接已傳回到連接集區。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is actually closed.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，如果`Pooling`設`false`或`no`，實際上關閉基礎連線到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 從連接集區中擷取連接或將連接傳回連接集區時，系統不會在伺服器上引發登入和登出事件，因為當連接傳回連接集區時，連接實際上並未關閉。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that connections are always closed, open the connection inside of a `using` block, as shown in the following code fragment.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保永遠關閉的連線，開啟 內部連接`using`區塊，如下列程式碼片段所示。

trans-unit.source: Doing so ensures that the connection is automatically closed when the code exits the block.
trans-unit.target: 這樣可以確保程式碼結束該區塊時，自動關閉連線。

trans-unit.source: To deploy high-performance applications, you must use connection pooling.
trans-unit.target: 若要部署高效能應用程式，您必須使用連接共用。

trans-unit.source: When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically, although you can modify some settings.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 時，您不必啟用連接共用，因為提供者會自動管理雖然您可以修改某些設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is generated by the method executing a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> remains open when the severity level is 19 or less.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>所執行的方法產生<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>仍保持開啟時的嚴重性層級為 19 或更少。

trans-unit.source: When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器的嚴重性層級 20 或以上時，通常會關閉<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>。

trans-unit.source: However, the user can reopen the connection and continue.
trans-unit.target: 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。

trans-unit.source: An application that creates an instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體的應用程式<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>物件可能會要求所有直接和間接呼叫端擁有足夠的權限的程式碼所設定的宣告式或必要的安全性要求。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> makes security demands using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 可使用的安全性要求<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission>物件。

trans-unit.source: Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermissionAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以確認他們的程式碼使用具有足夠的權限<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermissionAttribute>物件。

trans-unit.source: Users and administrators can also use the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) to modify security policy at the machine, user, and enterprise levels.
trans-unit.target: 使用者和系統管理員也可以使用[Caspol.exe （程式碼存取安全性原則工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)修改電腦、 使用者和企業層級的安全性原則。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6)。

trans-unit.source: For an example demonstrating how to use security demands, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何使用安全性要求的範例，請參閱[程式碼存取安全性和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the server, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理來自伺服器的警告和告知性訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱[連接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server engine errors and error messages are documented in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 引擎錯誤與錯誤訊息會記錄在 SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。

trans-unit.source: You can force TCP instead of shared memory.
trans-unit.target: 您可以強制 TCP，而非共用的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: You can do that by prefixing tcp: to the server name in the connection string or you can use localhost.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行此動作 tcp 前面加上： 在連接中的伺服器名稱的字串，或者您可以使用 localhost。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is opened and set as the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A> for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>已開啟，並設定為<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>如<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會接著呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> is passed a connection string and a query string that is a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] INSERT statement.
trans-unit.target: 若要達成此目的，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>連接字串和查詢字串傳遞至[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]INSERT 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed automatically when the code exits the using block.
trans-unit.target: 使用的程式碼結束時自動關閉連接區塊。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The connection used to open the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 開啟 SQL Server 資料庫所使用的連線。

trans-unit.target: 指定包含連接字串的字串時，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 新執行個體時<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>建立時，讀取/寫入屬性都設定為下列的起始值，除非它們特別設定使用中其相關聯的關鍵字<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 您可以變更這些屬性的值只能透過<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>類別會提供建立和管理的連接字串內容的功能。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立並開啟<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>。

trans-unit.source: A connection string that does not use any of the following connection string keywords: <see langword="Integrated Security = true" />, <see langword="UserId" />, or <see langword="Password" />; or that does not use <see langword="ContextConnection = true" />.
trans-unit.target: 不使用下列任何連接字串關鍵字的連接字串：<see langword="Integrated Security = true" />、<see langword="UserId" /> 或 <see langword="Password" />；或者不使用 <see langword="ContextConnection = true" /> 的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> class given a connection string, that does not use <see langword="Integrated Security = true" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> object that contains the user ID and password.
trans-unit.target: 根據不使用 <see langword="Integrated Security = true" /> 的連接字串以及包含使用者 ID 和密碼的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 物件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the access token for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此連接的存取權杖。

trans-unit.source: The access token for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 此連接的存取權杖。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 開始資料庫交易。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 開始資料庫交易。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 代表新異動的物件。

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定.NET Framework 資料提供者，SQL Server 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定隔離等級，則會使用預設隔離等級。

trans-unit.source: To specify an isolation level with the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> method, use the overload that takes the `iso` parameter (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 若要指定隔離等級<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>方法，使用的多載，`iso`參數 (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The isolation level set for a transaction persists after the transaction is completed and until the connection is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: 設定交易的隔離等級會保存在交易完成之後，直到關閉或處置連接。

trans-unit.source: Setting the isolation level to **Snapshot** in a database where the snapshot isolation level is not enabled does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 隔離層級設定為**快照**中未啟用快照隔離等級的資料庫不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The transaction will complete using the default isolation level.
trans-unit.target: 完成交易使用的預設隔離等級。

trans-unit.source: If a transaction is started and a level 16 or higher error occurs on the server, the transaction will not be rolled back until the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟動交易層級 16 或更高的錯誤，就會發生在伺服器上，交易將不會回復直到<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown on **ExecuteReader**.
trans-unit.target: 會擲回任何例外狀況**ExecuteReader**。

trans-unit.source: When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS.
trans-unit.target: 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連線，或兩者都開啟任何讀取器之前。

trans-unit.source: For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 SQL Server 異動的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》中的「外顯異動」和「撰寫有效率的異動」。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>、 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: 使用 Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS) 時不允許平行交易。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援平行交易。

trans-unit.source: The isolation level under which the transaction should run.
trans-unit.target: 應該在其下執行異動的隔離等級。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的隔離等級開始資料庫異動。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 代表新異動的物件。

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定.NET Framework 資料提供者，SQL Server 交易管理模型會正確執行，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。

trans-unit.source: After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the SQL Server default).
trans-unit.target: 認可或回復交易之後，交易的隔離等級會持續處於自動認可模式 （SQL Server 預設值） 的所有後續命令。

trans-unit.source: This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row.
trans-unit.target: 這會產生非預期的結果，例如保存和鎖定的資料列外的其他使用者 REPEATABLE READ 隔離等級。

trans-unit.source: To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> followed immediately by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重設預設 （讀取認可） 的隔離等級，執行[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]設定交易隔離等級 READ COMMITTED 陳述式或呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>立即接著<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see "Isolation Levels in the Database Engine" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 SQL Server 隔離層級的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 隔離層級在 Database Engine > SQL Server 線上叢書 》 中。

trans-unit.source: For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 SQL Server 異動的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》中的「外顯異動」和「撰寫有效率的異動」。

trans-unit.source: When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is thrown because SQL Server does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS.
trans-unit.target: 當您的查詢傳回大量的資料和呼叫`BeginTransaction`、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>因為 SQL Server 不允許平行交易使用 MARS 時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，一律關聯交易命令、 連線，或兩者都開啟任何讀取器之前。

trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>、 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用 Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS) 時不允許平行交易。

trans-unit.target: 不支援平行交易。

trans-unit.target: 代表新異動的物件。

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the SQL Server implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將對應至 SQL Server 實作的 BEGIN TRANSACTION。

trans-unit.source: The length of the `transactionName` parameter must not exceed 32 characters; otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 長度`transactionName`參數必須不能超過 32 個字元，否則會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The value in the `transactionName` parameter can be used in later calls to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> and in the `savePoint` parameter of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 中的值`transactionName`參數可以用於稍後呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>和`savePoint`參數<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您必須明確地認可或回復交易使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for SQL Server transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: 若要確定[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]資料提供者的 SQL Server 交易管理模式執行正確，請避免使用其他的交易管理模式，例如 SQL Server 提供的。

trans-unit.source: After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the SQL Server default).
trans-unit.target: 認可或回復交易之後，交易的隔離等級會持續處於自動認可模式 （SQL Server 預設值） 的所有後續命令。

trans-unit.source: This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row.
trans-unit.target: 這會產生非預期的結果，例如保存和鎖定的資料列外的其他使用者 REPEATABLE READ 隔離等級。

trans-unit.source: To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> followed immediately by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).

trans-unit.source: The name of the database to use instead of the current database.
trans-unit.target: 用於代替目前資料庫的資料庫名稱。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current database for an open <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 為開啟的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 變更目前的資料庫。

trans-unit.source: The value supplied in the `database` parameter must be a valid database name.
trans-unit.target: 中提供的值`database`參數必須是有效的資料庫名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `database` parameter cannot contain a null value, an empty string, or a string with only blank characters.
trans-unit.target: `database`參數不能包含 null 值、 空字串或只有空白字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and displays some of its read-only properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>並顯示其部分唯讀屬性。

trans-unit.source: The database name is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: 連接未開啟。

trans-unit.source: Cannot change the database.
trans-unit.target: 無法變更資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Changes the SQL Server password.
trans-unit.target: 變更 SQL Server 密碼。

trans-unit.source: The connection string that contains enough information to connect to the server that you want.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串，包含的資訊足以連接至您要的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The connection string must contain the user ID and the current password.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串必須包含使用者 ID 和目前的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The new password to set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: This password must comply with any password security policy set on the server, including minimum length, requirements for specific characters, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 這個密碼必須符合伺服器上設定的任何密碼安全性原則，包括最小長度、特定字元的需求等。

trans-unit.source: Changes the SQL Server password for the user indicated in the connection string to the supplied new password.
trans-unit.target: 將連接字串中指示的使用者 SQL Server 密碼變更成提供的新密碼。

trans-unit.source: When you are using SQL Server on Windows Server, developers can take advantage of functionality that lets the client application supply both the current and a new password in order to change the existing password.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 SQL Server 在 Windows Server 上時，開發人員可以利用可讓用戶端應用程式，提供目前和新的密碼，才能變更現有密碼的功能。

trans-unit.source: Applications can implement functionality such as prompting the user for a new password during initial login if the old one has expired, and this operation can be completed without administrator intervention.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以實作功能，例如初始登入期間提示使用者輸入新密碼，如果舊的密碼已過期，而且可以完成這項作業，而不需系統管理員介入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword%2A> method changes the SQL Server password for the user indicated in the supplied `connectionString` parameter to the value supplied in the `newPassword` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword%2A>方法變更使用者指示中所提供的 SQL Server 密碼`connectionString`參數中提供的值來`newPassword`參數。

trans-unit.source: If the connection string includes the option for integrated security (that is, "Integrated Security=True" or the equivalent), an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接字串會包含整合式安全性的選項 (也就是 「 整合式的安全性 = True"或同等權限)，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To determine that the password has expired, calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Open%2A> method raises a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷已過期的密碼，呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Open%2A>方法會引發<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>。

trans-unit.source: In order to indicate that the password that is contained within the connection string must be reset, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException.Number%2A> property for the exception contains the status value 18487 or 18488.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否包含在連接字串的密碼必須重設，以便<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException.Number%2A>例外狀況的屬性包含狀態值 18487 或 18488。

trans-unit.source: The first value (18487) indicates that the password has expired and the second (18488) indicates that the password must be reset before logging in.
trans-unit.target: 第一個值 (18487) 表示的密碼已過期的第二個 (18488) 表示登入之前，必須重設密碼。

trans-unit.source: This method opens its own connection to the server, requests the password change, and closes the connection as soon as it has completed.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會開啟它自己的伺服器連接、 要求密碼變更，並關閉連接，因為它已完成。

trans-unit.source: This connection is not retrieved from, nor returned to, the SQL Server connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 此連線不擷取，也不會傳回 SQL Server 連接集區。

trans-unit.source: Empties the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 清空連接集區。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClearAllPools%2A> resets (or empties) the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClearAllPools%2A> 重設 （或清空） 連接集區。

trans-unit.source: If there are connections in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and will be discarded (instead of being returned to the pool) when <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> is called on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫時的使用中的連接，它們會適當地標記將會被捨棄 （而不是傳回至集區） 時<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>呼叫它們。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> to be cleared from the pool.
trans-unit.target: 要從集區中清除的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Empties the connection pool associated with the specified connection.
trans-unit.target: 清空與特定連接關聯的連接集區。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClearPool%2A> clears the connection pool that is associated with the `connection`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClearPool%2A> 清除連接集區相關聯`connection`。

trans-unit.source: If additional connections associated with `connection` are in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and are discarded (instead of being returned to the pool) when <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> is called on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他連接相關聯`connection`是使用中，在呼叫時，會適當地標記的人員，並會被捨棄 （而不是傳回至集區） 時<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>呼叫它們。

trans-unit.source: The connection ID of the most recent connection attempt, regardless of whether the attempt succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 最近連線的連線 ID，無論連線是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The connection ID of the most recent connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 最近連線的連線 ID。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClientConnectionId%2A> works regardless of which version of the server you connect to, but extended events logs and entry on connectivity ring buffer errors will not be present in [!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)] and earlier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClientConnectionId%2A> 連線的伺服器版本為何，都會運作，但擴充的事件記錄檔以及有關連接性信號緩衝錯誤的項目將不會出現在[!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)]及更早版本。

trans-unit.source: You can locate the connection ID in the extended events log to see if the failure was on the server if the extended event for logging connection ID is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看失敗是否在伺服器上已啟用擴充的事件記錄連接識別碼，是否擴充的事件記錄檔中，您可以找到連接識別碼。

trans-unit.source: You can also locate the connection ID in the connection ring buffer ([Connectivity troubleshooting in SQL Server 2008 with the Connectivity Ring Buffer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) for certain connection errors.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在連接信號緩衝區中找到的連接識別碼 ([連接 SQL Server 2008 中與連接信號緩衝區疑難排解](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) 針對特定連接錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If the connection ID is not in the connection ring buffer, you can assume a network error.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接識別碼不在連接信號緩衝區中，您可以假設發生網路錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: 關閉與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.
trans-unit.target: 這是關閉任何開啟連接的慣用方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> method rolls back any pending transactions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>方法會回復任何暫止交易。

trans-unit.source: It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會釋放連接集區中，連接或關閉連接，如果連接共用已停用。

trans-unit.source: Pending transactions started using [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> are automatically rolled back when the connection is reset if connection pooling is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 暫止的交易會使用啟動[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>啟用連接共用時，會重設連接時自動交易回復。

trans-unit.source: If connection pooling is off, the transaction is rolled back after `SqlConnection.Close` is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接共用已關閉，交易會復原之後`SqlConnection.Close`呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Transactions started through <xref:System.Transactions> are controlled through the `System.Transactions` infrastructure, and are not affected by `SqlConnection.Close`.
trans-unit.target: 透過啟動交易<xref:System.Transactions>透過控制`System.Transactions`基礎結構，並不會受到`SqlConnection.Close`。

trans-unit.source: An application can call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> more than one time.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以呼叫<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>一次以上。

trans-unit.source: No exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: 會不產生任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> goes out of scope, it won't be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>移出的範圍，它將不會關閉。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須明確地關閉此連接呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`。

trans-unit.source: `Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent.
trans-unit.target: `Close` 和`Dispose`相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接共用值`Pooling`設`true`或`yes`、 基礎連接已傳回到連接集區。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is closed.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，如果`Pooling`設`false`或`no`，就會關閉基礎連線到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 從連接集區中擷取連接或將連接傳回連接集區時，系統不會在伺服器上引發登入和登出事件，因為當連接傳回連接集區時，連接實際上並未關閉。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。

trans-unit.source: Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class.
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`連線、 DataReader 或在任何其他 managed 的物件上`Finalize`類別的方法。

trans-unit.source: In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly.
trans-unit.target: 在完成項中，您應該只需釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>, opens it, displays some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>、 開啟、 顯示的某些屬性。

trans-unit.source: The connection is automatically closed at the end of the `using` block.
trans-unit.target: 連線會自動關閉的結尾`using`區塊。

trans-unit.source: The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.
trans-unit.target: 開啟連接時發生的連接層級錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time-to-live for column encryption key entries in the column encryption key cache for the [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) feature.
trans-unit.target: 針對 [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) 功能，取得或設定資料行加密金鑰快取中資料行加密金鑰項目的存留時間。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 2 hours.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 2 小時。

trans-unit.source: 0 means no caching at all.
trans-unit.target: 0 表示完全沒有快取。

trans-unit.source: The time interval.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether query metadata caching is enabled (true) or not (false) for parameterized queries running against [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) enabled databases.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要針對根據已啟用 [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) 的資料庫執行的參數化查詢，啟用 (true) 或停用 (false) 查詢中繼資料快取。

trans-unit.source: The default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 true。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if query metadata caching is enabled; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用查詢中繼資料快取，即會傳回 true；否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: true is the default.
trans-unit.target: true 為預設值。

trans-unit.source: For parameterized queries, SqlClient makes a roundtrip to SQL Server for parameter metadata, to see which parameter it needs to encrypt and how (which keys and algorithms should be used).
trans-unit.target: 參數化查詢，SqlClient 會往返到 SQL Server 的參數中繼資料，以查看哪個參數需要加密和方式 （哪些金鑰和演算法應該使用）。

trans-unit.source: If the application calls the same query multiple times, an extra roundtrip is made to the server each time, which degrades application performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式會多次呼叫同一個查詢，額外的往返是對伺服器應用程式的效能會降低每一次。

trans-unit.source: With **ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled** set to true, if the same query is called multiple times, the roundtrip to the server will be made only once.
trans-unit.target: 與**ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled**設定為 true，如果相同的查詢會呼叫多次，往返於伺服器不會進行一次。

trans-unit.source: The cache has a non-configurable Max size parameter that is set to 2000 queries.
trans-unit.target: 快取的不可設定的最大大小參數設為 2000年查詢。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to set a list of trusted key paths for a database server.
trans-unit.target: 可讓您為資料庫伺服器設定受信任機碼路徑的清單。

trans-unit.source: If while processing an application query the driver receives a key path that is not on the list, the query will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果在處理應用程式查詢時，驅動程式收到的機碼路徑不在清單上，查詢就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: This property provides additional protection against security attacks that involve a compromised SQL Server providing fake key paths, which may lead to leaking key store credentials.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供額外的保護以對抗安全性攻擊，事關受危害的 SQL Server 提供虛構的機碼路徑，這有可能導致金鑰存放區認證洩漏。

trans-unit.source: The list of trusted master key paths for the column encryption.
trans-unit.target: 資料行加密的受信任的主要機碼路徑清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string used to open a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來開啟 SQL Server 資料庫的字串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string that includes the source database name, and other parameters needed to establish the initial connection.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串，包含來源資料庫名稱和其他建立初始連接所需要的參數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> is similar to an OLE DB connection string, but is not identical.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>類似於 OLE DB 連接字串，但並不相同。

trans-unit.source: Unlike OLE DB or ADO, the connection string that is returned is the same as the user-set <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>, minus security information if the Persist Security Info value is set to `false` (default).
trans-unit.target: 不同於 OLE DB 或 ADO，連接字串，則會傳回等同於使用者設定<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>，減去 Persist Security Info 值設定為時的安全性資訊`false`（預設值）。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server does not persist or return the password in a connection string unless you set Persist Security Info to `true`.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 不會保存或傳回連接字串中的密碼，除非您設定 Persist Security Info `true`。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property to connect to a database.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>內容，連接至資料庫。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a typical connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明一般連接字串。

trans-unit.source: Use the new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> to construct valid connection strings at run time.
trans-unit.target: 使用新<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>在執行階段建構有效的連接字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[連接字串產生器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property can be set only when the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>連接關閉時，才可以設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Many of the connection string values have corresponding read-only properties.
trans-unit.target: 許多連接字串值都有對應的唯讀屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the connection string is set, these properties are updated, except when an error is detected.
trans-unit.target: 當連接字串設定時，這些內容更新時，偵測到錯誤時除外。

trans-unit.source: In this case, none of the properties are updated.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，會更新任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> properties return only those settings that are contained in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 屬性會傳回中所包含的那些設定<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To connect to a local computer, specify "(local)" for the server.
trans-unit.target: 若要連接到本機電腦上，指定 「 （本機） 」 伺服器。

trans-unit.source: If a server name is not specified, a connection will be attempted to the default instance on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定伺服器名稱，連接將會嘗試在本機電腦上的預設執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> on a closed connection resets all connection string values (and related properties) including the password.
trans-unit.target: 重設<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>關閉的連接會重設所有連接字串值 （和相關的屬性） 包括密碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set a connection string that includes "Database= AdventureWorks", and then reset the connection string to "Data Source=myserver;Integrated Security=true", the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A> property is no longer set to "AdventureWorks".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您設定連接字串，包含 「 資料庫 = AdventureWorks"，然後重設連接字串 」 資料來源 = myserver; 整合式的安全性 = true"，則<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>屬性不再設定為 「 AdventureWorks 」。

trans-unit.source: The connection string is parsed immediately after being set.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串會剖析之後立即設定。

trans-unit.source: If errors in syntax are found when parsing, a runtime exception, such as <xref:System.ArgumentException>, is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果剖析時，執行階段例外狀況，例如發現語法錯誤<xref:System.ArgumentException>，就會產生。

trans-unit.source: Other errors can be found only when an attempt is made to open the connection.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試開啟連接時，才可以找到其他錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The basic format of a connection string includes a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 連接字串的基本格式包含一系列以分號隔開的關鍵字/值組。

trans-unit.source: The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value.
trans-unit.target: 等號 (=) 會連接每個關鍵字和其值。

trans-unit.source: To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入包含分號、 單引號字元或雙引號字元的值，值必須括在雙引號中。

trans-unit.source: If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果值包含分號和雙引號字元，該值可括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: The single quotation mark is also useful if the value starts with a double-quote character.
trans-unit.target: 單一引號也很有用，如果值以雙引號字元開頭的。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, the double quotation mark can be used if the value starts with a single quotation mark.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，如果值以單引號開始，可以使用雙引號。

trans-unit.source: If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quotation mark character used to enclose the value must be doubled every time it occurs within the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果值包含單引號和雙引號字元，用來括住值的引號字元必須加倍，每次出現的值內。

trans-unit.source: To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotation marks or double quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含上述或尾端空格的字串值中，值必須括在單引號或雙引號括住。

trans-unit.source: Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 會忽略任何開頭或尾端空格，整數、 布林值或列舉的值的周圍，即使以引號括住。

trans-unit.source: However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在字串常值關鍵字或值的空格會保留。

trans-unit.source: Single or double quotation marks may be used within a connection string without using delimiters (for example, Data Source= my'Server or Data Source= my"Server), unless a quotation mark character is the first or last character in the value.
trans-unit.target: 單引號或雙引號可能使用的連接字串內使用的分隔符號 (例如，資料來源 = my'Server 或資料來源 = 我的 」 伺服器)，除非引號字元是在值中的第一個或最後一個字元。

trans-unit.source: Keywords are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 關鍵字不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid names for keyword values within the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出中的關鍵字值的有效名稱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following list contains the valid names for connection pooling values within the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單包含連接共用內的值的有效名稱<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [SQL Server 連共用ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。

trans-unit.source: Connection Lifetime (or Load Balance Timeout)
trans-unit.target: 連線的存留期 （或 Load Balance Timeout）

trans-unit.source: Enlist
trans-unit.target: Enlist

trans-unit.source: Max Pool Size
trans-unit.target: Max Pool Size

trans-unit.source: Min Pool Size
trans-unit.target: Min Pool Size

trans-unit.source: Pooling
trans-unit.target: Pooling

trans-unit.source: When you are setting keyword or connection pooling values that require a Boolean value, you can use 'yes' instead of 'true', and 'no' instead of 'false'.
trans-unit.target: 當您要設定關鍵字或連接共用需要布林值的值時，您可以使用 'yes' 而不是 'true' 和 'no' 而不是 'false'。

trans-unit.source: Integer values are represented as strings.
trans-unit.target: 整數值會表示為字串。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server uses its own protocol to communicate with SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 會使用自己的通訊協定與 SQL Server 通訊。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it does not support the use of an ODBC data source name (DSN) when connecting to SQL Server because it does not add an ODBC layer.
trans-unit.target: 因此，它不支援使用 ODBC 資料來源名稱 (DSN) 連接到 SQL Server，因為它不會新增 ODBC 圖層時。

trans-unit.source: Universal data link (UDL) files are not supported for the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework Data provider for SQL Server 不支援通用資料連結 (UDL) 檔案。

trans-unit.source: In this release, the application should use caution when constructing a connection string based on user input (for example when retrieving user ID and password information from a dialog box, and appending it to the connection string).
trans-unit.target: 在此版本中，應用程式只有在建構連接字串，根據使用者輸入 （例如從對話方塊中，並將它附加至連接字串中擷取使用者識別碼和密碼資訊時） 時應謹慎小心。

trans-unit.source: The application should make sure that a user cannot embed additional connection string parameters in these values (for example, entering a password as "validpassword;database=somedb" in an attempt to attach to a different database).
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該要確定使用者無法在這些值中內嵌的其他連接字串參數 (例如，輸入密碼做為"validpassword; 資料庫 = somedb"在嘗試附加至不同的資料庫)。

trans-unit.source: If you need to construct connection strings based on user input, use the new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, which validates the connection string and helps to eliminate this problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要建構根據使用者輸入的連接字串，請使用新<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>，其驗證的連接字串，並且有助於消除這個問題。

trans-unit.source: See [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[連接字串產生器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and sets the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property before opening the connection.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: 等待連接開啟的時間 (以秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 15 seconds.

trans-unit.source: You can set the amount of time a connection waits to time out by using the `Connect Timeout` or `Connection Timeout` keywords in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用的逾時時間設定的連接所等待的時間量`Connect Timeout`或`Connection Timeout`連接字串中的關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> because an attempt to connect waits indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 值為 0 表示無限制，並應避免在<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>因為連線嘗試會無限期等待。

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值小於 0。

trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回與 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 物件。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> object for this connection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個連接的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> object for this connection.
trans-unit.target: 這個連接的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: `Persist Security Info = true` is required to get the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential> object with <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `Persist Security Info = true` 取得值，才能<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential>物件<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is null.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>為 null。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception will be raised:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>會引發例外狀況：

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set on an open connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>開啟的連接上設定。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set when `Context Connection=true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>時，會設定`Context Connection=true`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set when `Integrated Security = true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>時，會設定`Integrated Security = true`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set when the connection string uses `Password`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>設定當連接字串使用`Password`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set when the connection string uses `UserID`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>設定當連接字串使用`UserID`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前資料庫或要在連接開啟之後使用的資料庫名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 目前資料庫的名稱或連接開啟後要使用之資料庫的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>屬性會動態更新。

trans-unit.source: If you change the current database using a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement or the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method, an informational message is sent and the property is updated automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更目前的資料庫使用[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]陳述式或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法，會傳送參考用訊息，並自動更新的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: 取得要連線的 SQL Server 執行個體名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: 要連接的 SQL Server 執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.DataSource%2A>屬性會傳回`null`的連接字串如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>是 「 內容連接 = true"。
